description.narrative:
Existing and potential/start-up SMEs, as the carriers of economic development in their areas Minority communities while direct approaches will be made to minority groups, women and youth groups in targeted regions so the maximum awareness of activities and maximum participation is ensured
The whole population of targeted region would benefit from strong economy of minority areas, as they will eventually have to get involved into economic flows outside their communities, especially with growth of their businesses

The Partner shares the vision of the Program: The consortium partners are united in their vision that pro-poor sustainable economic growth, particularly through (1) strengthening relevant local partners, (2) facilitating entrepreneurship; and (3) creating an enabling environment for private sector development, is essential for creating self-reliance and thereby poverty alleviation in least developed countries and fragile states. The United Entrepreneurship Coalition and its partners works towards this vision efficiently and effectively;
